body:
I've fixed @Osmose's review comments, and added some light testing.

@rhelmer To ease integration with mozilla-central, we have Firefox peers review add-on code here on GitHub. Usually we have Gijs do this, but since you recently worked on the timer, I figured you'd be a better reviewer here. Can you take a look at this?

body_html:
I've fixed @Osmose's review comments, and added some light testing.

@rhelmer To ease integration with mozilla-central, we have Firefox peers review add-on code here on GitHub. Usually we have Gijs do this, but since you recently worked on the timer, I figured you'd be a better reviewer here. Can you take a look at this?
